item.title: Latest Apple Ad Highlights 'Clean Up' Feature in Photos
item.description: Apple today shared a new iPhone 16 ad that highlights the Clean Up feature that’s available in the Photos app. In the spot, a man snaps a photo of a woman with her cat, and then removes the cat from t
